andromeda.why: Refuses coerced sociability; keeps sovereignty over when to open.

arcturus.why: Regulates timing and mood—builds a clean container before engaging.

draco.why: Early ‘right vibe’ anxiety can slip into status/correctness policing.

lyra.why: Gentle aesthetic poise, even in restraint.

orion-dark.why: Using politeness as control/doctrine rather than truth.

orion-light.why: Micro-ordeal: wait until the feeling is true before speaking.

pleiades.why: Attunes to room safety and receptivity—mood-first hospitality.

sirius.why: Pre-teaching restraint; no formal transmission yet.

draco.why: Popularity gatekeeping can creep in under pressure.

lyra.why: Natural elegance; grace flows when the timing is right.

orion-dark.why: Hiding behind etiquette to avoid authenticity.

orion-light.why: Honorable restraint—speak or engage only when aligned.

sirius.why: Relational tuning, not codified instruction yet.

draco.why: Success can attract gatekeeping of ‘who belongs’ socially.

lyra.why: Charismatic hosting; beauty and tone that invite authentic contact.

lyra.why: Iconic presence—style and tone signal cultural standards.
